misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face from Hirsala Golf, brings his distinctive flair to the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. This will mark his fifth appearance at the esteemed tournament.

Known for his strategic mind and, at times, a somewhat delicate back, Okko has become a recognizable figure on the course. Off the course, his name is etched in Hector Trophée lore as the namesake of the infamous 'Okkotoberfest,' a testament to a memorable, alcohol-induced episode during a past event.
With one Hector Trophée victory already under his belt, Okko will certainly be one to watch.
